amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-516 to clarify the application of the Bank Secrecy Act to digital asset and digital commodity entities and to require a Government Accountability Office study on risks posed by centralized intermediaries that are primarily located in foreign jurisdictions without regulatory requirements similar to those of the Bank Secrecy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
